title: Organic Wheat
description: Premium quality organic wheat grown without pesticides. Rich in fiber, vitamins, and minerals. Ideal for making bread, chapatis, and other bakery products. Sourced from certified organic farms.

title: Basmati Rice
description: Authentic long-grain Basmati rice with aromatic fragrance. Perfect for biryani, pulao, and everyday meals. Aged for 12 months for enhanced taste and texture.

title: Fresh Tomatoes
description: Farm-fresh red tomatoes, handpicked at peak ripeness. Rich in lycopene and vitamin C. Perfect for curries, salads, and sauces.

title: Premium Potatoes
description: High-quality potatoes with smooth skin and firm texture. Versatile for frying, boiling, or roasting. Rich in potassium and vitamin B6.

title: Yellow Maize
description: Premium quality yellow maize with high nutritional value. Used for animal feed, corn flour, and industrial purposes. Non-GMO and naturally grown.

title: Red Onions
description: Fresh red onions with strong flavor and long shelf life. Essential ingredient for Indian cooking. Rich in antioxidants and quercetin.

title: Organic Soybean
description: High-protein organic soybeans perfect for oil extraction and food processing. Rich in essential amino acids and omega-3 fatty acids.

title: Pearl Barley
description: Nutritious pearl barley perfect for soups, stews, and salads. High in fiber and minerals. Great for health-conscious consumers.

title: Green Chili
description: Fresh green chilies with medium to high heat level. Essential for Indian cuisine. Rich in vitamin C and capsaicin. Adds flavor and spice to any dish.

title: Fresh Coriander
description: Aromatic fresh coriander leaves with vibrant green color. Perfect garnish and flavor enhancer. Rich in antioxidants and vitamins.

title: Black Mustard Seeds
description: Premium black mustard seeds with pungent flavor. Essential for tempering and pickling. Rich in selenium and omega-3 fatty acids.

title: Fresh Ginger
description: Aromatic fresh ginger root with strong flavor. Used in cooking, teas, and traditional medicine. Anti-inflammatory and digestive properties.

title: Garlic Bulbs
description: Premium quality garlic bulbs with strong aroma. Essential ingredient in all cuisines. Known for health benefits including immune support.

title: Sugarcane
description: Fresh sugarcane stalks perfect for juice extraction and sugar production. Sweet and juicy. Rich in natural sugars and minerals.

title: Red Apples
description: Crisp and sweet red apples. Rich in fiber, vitamin C, and antioxidants. Perfect for snacking and desserts. Carefully graded for quality.

title: Golden Bananas
description: Naturally ripened golden bananas with sweet taste. Rich in potassium, vitamin B6, and fiber. Perfect for direct consumption or smoothies.

title: Alphonso Mango
description: King of mangoes - Alphonso variety with exceptional sweetness and flavor. Rich golden pulp. Perfect for eating fresh or making desserts.

title: Nagpur Oranges
description: Juicy Nagpur oranges with perfect balance of sweet and tangy. Rich in vitamin C. Thin skin and seedless varieties available.

title: Fresh Pineapple
description: Sweet and tangy pineapples with golden flesh. Rich in bromelain enzyme and vitamin C. Perfect for juices, smoothies, and fruit salads.

title: Red Papaya
description: Sweet red papaya rich in papain enzyme and vitamins. Excellent for digestion. Perfect for breakfast and fruit platters.

title: Fresh Strawberries
description: Premium fresh strawberries with bright red color. Sweet and aromatic. Rich in antioxidants and vitamin C. Perfect for desserts.

title: Blueberries
description: Imported quality blueberries packed with antioxidants. Superfood known for brain health. Perfect for smoothies and baking.

title: Fresh Raspberries
description: Delicate fresh raspberries with sweet-tart flavor. High in fiber and antioxidants. Perfect for desserts, jams, and garnishing.

title: Blackberries
description: Juicy blackberries with deep purple color. Rich in vitamins C and K. Excellent for jams, pies, and fresh eating.

title: Green Cabbage
description: Fresh green cabbage with crisp leaves. Rich in fiber, vitamin C, and antioxidants. Perfect for salads, stir-fries, and soups.

title: Red Cabbage
description: Vibrant red cabbage rich in anthocyanins. Nutritious and crunchy. Ideal for salads, slaws, and saut√©ed dishes.

title: Cucumber
description: Fresh cucumbers with crisp texture and mild flavor. Hydrating and low-calorie. Perfect for salads and snacks.

title: Carrots
description: Bright orange carrots rich in beta-carotene. Crunchy and sweet. Ideal for salads, cooking, and juicing.

title: Beetroot
description: Fresh red beetroot packed with nutrients. Sweet earthy flavor. Great for salads, juices, and cooking.

title: Spinach
description: Fresh green spinach leaves rich in iron and vitamins. Perfect for cooking, salads, and smoothies.

title: Fenugreek Leaves
description: Fresh fenugreek leaves with aromatic flavor. Rich in iron, fiber, and vitamins. Ideal for Indian curries and parathas.

title: Mint Leaves
description: Aromatic fresh mint leaves. Perfect for chutneys, beverages, and garnishing. Rich in antioxidants and refreshing flavor.

title: Basil Leaves
description: Fresh basil leaves with strong aroma. Ideal for Italian cooking and garnishing. Rich in essential oils and nutrients.

title: Cilantro
description: Fresh cilantro leaves with vibrant green color. Perfect for salads, curries, and garnishing. Rich in antioxidants and vitamins.

title: Chickpeas
description: High-quality chickpeas for cooking and flour preparation. Rich in protein, fiber, and essential minerals. Ideal for curries, salads, and snacks.

title: Red Kidney Beans
description: Premium red kidney beans rich in protein and fiber. Perfect for curries, soups, and salads. Carefully cleaned and sorted.

title: Green Moong Beans
description: Fresh green moong beans with high nutritional value. Rich in protein and vitamins. Ideal for sprouting, curries, and salads.

title: Lentils
description: High-quality lentils for cooking and flour preparation. Rich in protein, fiber, and essential nutrients. Perfect for soups, curries, and stews.

title: Turmeric Powder
description: Premium turmeric powder with high curcumin content. Bright yellow color, aromatic flavor. Used for cooking and medicinal purposes.

title: Cumin Seeds
description: High-quality cumin seeds with strong aroma. Essential for Indian and Middle Eastern cooking. Rich in antioxidants and minerals.

title: Coriander Seeds
description: Fresh coriander seeds with aromatic flavor. Essential for curries, spice blends, and pickling. Rich in antioxidants and essential oils.

title: Black Pepper
description: Premium black pepper with pungent flavor. Essential for seasoning and spice blends. Rich in antioxidants and aroma.

title: Cloves
description: High-quality cloves with strong aroma. Used in cooking, baking, and medicinal purposes. Rich in eugenol and antioxidants.

title: Cinnamon Sticks
description: Aromatic cinnamon sticks with sweet, warm flavor. Used for cooking, desserts, and medicinal purposes. Rich in antioxidants.

title: Cardamom
description: Premium green cardamom pods with strong fragrance. Used in cooking, desserts, and beverages. Rich in antioxidants and essential oils.

title: Sunflower Oil
description: Pure sunflower oil with light taste. High in vitamin E and low in saturated fats. Suitable for cooking, frying, and salads.

title: Mustard Oil
description: Cold-pressed mustard oil with pungent aroma. High in omega-3 fatty acids. Ideal for cooking and pickling.

title: Groundnut Oil
description: Pure groundnut oil with mild flavor. Rich in vitamin E and healthy fats. Perfect for cooking, frying, and salad dressing.

title: Coconut Oil
description: Cold-pressed virgin coconut oil with rich aroma. Ideal for cooking, hair care, and skin care. Rich in lauric acid and antioxidants.

title: Refined Soybean Oil
description: Refined soybean oil suitable for all cooking purposes. High in polyunsaturated fats. Neutral taste for versatile use.

title: Jaggery
description: Pure organic jaggery made from sugarcane. Rich in minerals and antioxidants. Ideal for desserts, beverages, and cooking.

title: Honey
description: Pure natural honey with sweet flavor. Rich in antioxidants and enzymes. Perfect for health drinks, desserts, and cooking.

title: Brown Sugar
description: Organic brown sugar with natural molasses. Sweet and aromatic. Suitable for baking, beverages, and cooking.

title: Stevia Powder
description: Natural stevia powder, zero-calorie sweetener. Ideal for health-conscious consumers. Perfect for beverages, baking, and cooking.
